metadata.title: Favicon Generator - Create Favicons in All Sizes | tool-chest
metadata.description: Free online favicon generator. Create favicons in all standard sizes (16x16, 32x32, 192x192, 512x512) from any image. Generate complete favicon packages with manifest files.

page.title: Favicon Generator

info.title: About Favicons
info.description: Favicons (favorite icons) are small icons displayed in browser tabs, bookmarks, and address bars. They help users identify your website quickly and improve brand recognition. Modern websites require multiple favicon sizes for different devices and use cases.

bestPractices.title: Best Practices
items: Start with 512Ã—512 source for best quality
Use PNG format for transparency support
